扤字的基本解释

扤
wù
折磨：“天之扤我，如不我克。”
骚动。
姓。

扤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》五忽切，入没，疑。］
［《廣韻》魚厥切，入月，疑。］
［《集韻》五活切，入曷，疑。］
(1)摇动；摆动。
(2)指摆脱。
(3)犹扼。掐住。

扤字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扤； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页418第08
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?五忽切。音兀。【說文】動也。【詩·小雅】天之扤我，如不我克。【周禮·冬官考工記·輪人】輻廣而鑿淺，則是以大扤。【揚子·方言】扤，不安也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?魚厥切，音月。義同。詩箋註有二音。　又【集韻】五活切，玩入聲。義同。或作卼。

扤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
扤字的起名意思

暂无。

move
Basic explanation of words
move
wù
Torture: "The sky will kill me, if I don't, I will overcome it."
commotion.
name.
move
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" five sudden cuts, no, doubtful. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Jue cuts, enters the moon, suspicious. ]
["Jiyun" five lively, entertaining, suspicious. ]
(1) Shake; swing.
(2) Refers to getting rid of.
(3) Still awkward. Pinch.
move
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　扤; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 418 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Five sudden cuts. Yinwu. [Said the text] Move too. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The sky will suffocate me. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Lun Ren] It is broad and shallow, but it is a big confession. 【Yangtze Dialect】Fun, uneasy.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jue cut, Yinyue. The same meaning. The poem notes have two syllables.　[Jiyun] Five lively, playful sounds. The same meaning. Or make a 卼.
